page.title: 17Recreation in Dean
page.content: Most of the actual facilities exist in Dean but are open to all. The open air swimming pool at Eileen Wade Lower School is provided by the Education Authority but is open for use to all members of the Parent Teacher Association and all residents of Upper and Lower Dean and Shelton. It is open from May to September till 8pm (5pm on Sundays) and is looked after by people in the village. It is extremely well used in good weather. The Sports Ground, formerly used by the cricket and football clubs and the Young Farmers, by permission of the tenant farmer, has now been bought for the village by the Dalton Trust.It will now be available to all members of the village. The Brownies have already held their sports day there. Young members of the cricket club also use it for coaching sessions.
